review: I had visited the hospital and it was health problem. Doctor was nice treatment-wise. I would like to recommend this doctor to other people if anyone asks. Painkillers were recommended by the doctor. I am recovering now. I had back pain issue and physiotherapy was suggested. Without even doing X-ray he told I have first stage of flip disc which is little scary. I am doing work from home now for 10 -12 hours in this covid time. Sitting in one place for long time, but I can't believe it would be flip disc. There was less waiting time in the hospital. Hospitality was good.
reply_text:
Nice to know that you are recovering Mr.Ashis. Don't think too much about the problem ( Diagnosis) and please follow the precautions as I suggested.
Iam sure you will be alright in due course of time.
Take care.

review: My mother had met the doctor and it was for health problem. ****** *** ***** I would recommend this doctor to other people if anyone ask. Medicine was suggested by the doctor. Visited for back pain issue. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Overall it was good experience. Problem is already reduced.
reply_text:
Nice to know that your mother's condition is improving.
Please take care.

review: I had backache so went to hospital and met the doctor. ********* *** **** ** *** ******. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Belt was suggested for neck. Painkiller was prescribed by the doctor. I am not facing any problem now health-wise. There was more waiting time in the hospital, it was for 40 -45 minutes. Doctor was friendly with me.
reply_text:
Thank you for your feedback.
Glad to know that you have recovered.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I will never recommend this doctor..I visited to him for pain in my wrist but doctor was not even ready to listen prob m facing..he was trying to finish meet within five minutes...he is not at all bother and concern abt my issue...after paying 700 rs at least he should give 7 minutes to patient to explain his problem.....better I could have gone to some other doctor..he just wanted to wind up ..not allowing me to say anything so that he can finish it quickly...highly disappointed ðŸ˜ž

I had been to hospital and met the doctor as I had back pain issues. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Painkiller was prescribed by the doctor only if pain is there.  X-ray was suggested. I am good now. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was for 30 minutes. Doctor was very friendly. Hospitality was good. Exercise was suggested and told to correct my posture.
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words.
It is gratifying to know that you are happy.
Regards.

review: My aunty had visited the hospital and met the doctor as she fell down due to which she had spinal issue. ****** *** ***** I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. X-ray was done in hospital. There was no waiting time in the hospital. I knew doctor before itself. My relative had been before. Doctor told to take bed rest for 3 months. Improvement is there and she can sit also now. Hospitality was good.
reply_text:
Very happy to know that your Aunty is improving.
Thanks for your kind words.
Regards.

review: I consulted the doctor as I had severe issues with my ankle and bones but the doctor did not give me the appropriate treatment, he said I have to wear proper shoes which was not useful to me. The doctor was good in terms of behavior and he was well speaking. I also had issue with payment as well where they did not accept credit card I had to go down and get cash. I will not recommend the doctor to my family and friends ** *** ****** *** *** ******** ************** There was no wait time.
reply_text:
I'm disappointed about not being to help you .
It is not appropriate to say I have not diagnosed your problem.
I request you to give enough time and follow the advice sincerely to get a result.
I don't recommend pain killer medications, which could have relieved you of your discomfort immediately,but I advise methods which will eliminate the cause of your pain completely.
There are certain problems which will need some time and follow up for recovery.
Iam always there to help you and answer your doubts .
You are welcome to visit us and I will try and help you as much as I can to resolve your problem.

Regards.

review: We had visited the hospital and it was health problem for my child. ****** *** **** ***** Calcium and vitamin tablets was done. X-ray was done. I am satisfied with the treatment given. We have plans to visit doctor again. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went. Hospitality was good.  *** ******** ** ****** *** *****
reply_text:
Thank you and iam happy to know that my advise has helped your child.
Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Srinivasan is an Extremely Rude Doctor, Did not explain the treatment. ** **** ******* ********* *** an elderly patient who had fallen down and has had a fracture in L1. The only treatment suggested was to lay down and be bed ridden for 3 months. Even when the patient was having extreme pain the doctor did not help, rather gave a rude response and suggested to go and visit a Physician **** *** ********* ******** *** *** ********** ********** ***** ***** ***** *** *** ********** Will definitely not recommend this doctor to anyone suffering and for one who requires immediate attention.
reply_text:
Pain killers are extremely dangerous in a elderly patients.
If i have refused to give pain killer medication to an elderly patient, the reason is obvious.
I will definitely look rude by being Frank and honest [ sometimes patient or relatives do not like it, as everyone wants a quick result].
A vertebral compression fracture needs rest and a brace and will heal in some time.
Iam sure you will understand as 3 months time has elapsed now.

review: I had consulted the doctor in january 2020 and it was for my knee related issue as i was suffering from knee tendon inflammation issue.  Doctor was  pretty nice, ** *** ****** ********* **** ** **** **** ****** * He suggested some exercise. He told not to worry. He gave medication. I visited for 3-4 weeks. I am satisfied with the treatment given.Â  I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went.Â  It was for 5-10 minutes. I can rate the doctor 4.5 out of 5, 5 being highest.Â Medicine was prescribed by the doctor , he told to take only if pain is there.   Hospitality was good.Â
reply_text:
Iam happy to know that you have recovered from your problem.
Thank you and take care.
